Title: Liability
Plot: Doug and Clyde give depositions in a wrongful-death suit filed against a telecommunications conglomerate, while a casino mogul impedes Marty's efforts to close a deal. Later, Monica unravels when Roscoe moves out.
ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes,violence,drug use and offensive language.
GuestStars: Larenz Tate, Nia Long, Mather Zickel, Elimu Nelson
